mapper.select: select loan.bill_no as billNo, loan.REALITY_IR_Y as realityIrY, loan.END_DATE as contEndDate, loan.LOAN_AMT as loanAmt, (loan.Rec_Int_Accum - loan.recv_int_accum) as intAccum, loan.DISTR_DATE as qixiDate, loan.DISTR_DATE as distrDate, loan.ACC_STATUS as accStatus, ecif.client_name as clientName, rownum row_index from o_clpm_acc_loan loan inner join qz_iesb_for_ecif ecif on loan.cus_id = ecif.client_no and ecif.customer_id = #{customerId}
